channel.title: I need help
channel.description:
Hi, I am trying to start a new server and every time I try to put it online so I can log in it comes up with this error "The system cannot find the path specified". I was wondering if anyone knew how to fix this and if so can you please tell me how to fix this error.
Thanks.

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

You need to edit the .bat files or whatever you use to run the server and change the “C:/Program Files blah blah/ blah/ jdk…” to the correct path of your jdk

Read full topic
